group_1.textLeft: I hope orange juice is fine~?

group_1.textRight: Oh, sure, thanks...

group_1.textLeft: It sucks that Ryuugasaki tried to jump you @like that earlier...
Thanks for coming to visit again today, though~

group_1.textRight: Well, you saved my life, after all, @so I decided to put my faith in you.
But... What exactly is this place...?
There's a bunch of other Magical Girls here...

group_1.textLeft: Hehe...
We're a team called Janomiya, @and this is our HQ~

group_1.textRight: Janomiya...huh...

group_1.textLeft: Mm-hm~
I'll bet you've only heard of Torayamachi and @Ryuugasaki, right~?
And there used to be Monzenbashi, @but that team's long gone~

group_1.textRight: Y-yeah, that's true...

group_1.textLeft: As for us~... We're like the assassin's guild in a video game.
Though in another way, we're just parasites.
Every one of us also belongs to either @Torayamachi or Ryuugasaki.
And we steal their Grief Seeds to keep ourselves @going~

group_1.textRight: [chara:102200:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]*Gasp*?!

group_1.textLeft: If you're good at tricking others and keeping secrets, @being with us is like playing on Easy Mode.

group_1.textRight: Do you guys really...

group_1.textLeft: Are you judging us?

group_1.textRight: N-no...

group_1.textLeft: It's fine~ I know we don't play fair.
But you know, the older girls in the other groups @do things much, much worse.
I've lost count of how many younger girls @have suffered because of them...

group_1.textRight: Ah...
Now that you mention it, @everyone here looks young...

group_1.textLeft: Oh, you noticed~?
Everyone in Janomiya is fifteen or under~
It's kids like us who have the toughest time in @situations like these, you know~
How old are you?

group_1.textRight: I'm thirteen.

group_1.textLeft: Then why not join Janomiya and help us?

group_1.textRight: Help you steal...?

group_1.textLeft: Not exactly.

group_1.textRight: Then what do you want help with...?

group_1.textLeft: Our war...

group_1.textRight: [chara:102200:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!

group_1.textLeft: If you say yes, I'll tell you everything.
But don't you dare think about betraying us, @or else...
[flashEffect:flashWhiteSlow2][se:7211_souljem_02]We'll kill you without a moment's hesitation.
We're always watching, @always waiting...

group_1.textRight: We're already well past the point where I can walk away, aren't we?

group_1.textLeft: Tehe, [chara:102300:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:102300:cheek_0][chara:102300:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:102300:lipSynch_1]@maybe~
But only for the moment.
You're free to go after we crush Torayamachi and Ryuugasaki.
And you'll be glad we did, too.
We've all suffered so much... @But it just makes us want it more and more...
A city where everyone can smile~

group_1.textRight: I see...

group_1.textLeft: Do you believe me?

group_1.textRight: Mm, I've made up my mind. I'm in!

group_1.textLeft: Hmhm~ I'm Ao Kasane, welcome aboard~

group_1.textRight: I'm Hikaru Kirari! Glad to be here!
So, what do you need me to do for you?

group_1.textLeft: You're eager to get started, huh~?

group_1.textRight: Told you I made up my mind.

group_1.textLeft: Alright then, let me tell you what's going on @and what our objectives are.
Torayamachi and Ryuugasaki will probably start @fighting each other soon.
And that's where all the undercover Janomiya @members will shine~

group_1.textRight: Shine...?

group_1.textLeft: That's right...
While the two gangs are fighting each other, @we'll rise up against them.
And then it's off with their heads.
We'll kill the Fang of Torayamachi, Yuna Kureha, @and the Flame of Ryuugasaki, Juri Ooba.
And then I, Ao Kasane, the Venom of Janomiya, @will turn this city into a peaceful one~

group_1.textRight: Woah...

group_1.textLeft: Are you judging us~?

group_1.textRight: I'm just surprised by how determined you are. @I even got goosebumps!
But are you sure the gangs are gonna fight?
I heard they're locked in a stalemate...

group_1.textLeft: Apparently Torayamachi lost their Horse~ @If that's true, it's only a matter of time~

group_1.textRight: A horse...?

group_1.textLeft: A mysterious Magical Girl who can summon an army against her foes.
Yuna Kureha put a lot of trust into her, @but she seems to have lost her~

group_1.textRight: So the chance to strike is right in front of us, huh...

group_1.textLeft: You've got it~!
There are plenty of other strats to use @aside from rushing or turtling.
Don't underestimate a hardcore gamer like me~
